amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funding for Research, Development, Test and Evaluation (sixth generation fighter development), Air Force, by $15,722,000 and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in the Congressional Record to reduce funding for Research, Development, Test and Evaluation, Air Force, by $15,722,000 and to apply the savings to the Spending Reduction Account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Coffman amendment (A023) Failed by voice vote.
